author: Vlad Savov
description: If YouTube comments stink, and they do, then YouTube live stream chats are positively radioactive in their toxicity. You can pick the most innocent of topics, like say kittens napping in a wicker...
title: YouTube’s paid chats are an abomination from a capitalist dystopia I want no part of

author: Adi Robertson
description: The virtual reality version of YouTube is adding shared rooms that will let people view 360-degree videos together, part of a larger update to Google’s Daydream VR platform. The new feature, coming...
title: YouTube VR will have shared rooms and voice chat instead of comment sections

author: Jörn Brien
description: Zeit totschlagen auf Facebook, Twitter oder Youtube? Nicht mit Todobook. Das Plugin für den Chrome-Browser bekämpft Prokrastination und befördert das Erledigen von Aufgaben.
title: Todobook: Dieses Plugin bekämpft Prokrastination auf Facebook, Youtube und Twitter

author: Anita Balakrishnan
description: Google has a vast array of software properties, including Android, Cloud, Google Assistant, YouTube, and its advertising and search offerings.
title: Google Photos has half a billion users — now it's making it easier for them to share their pictures

author: Robin Sinha
description: The lightweight OS aims to save the internet data in handsets as it includes apps such as YouTube Go, automatic data saving feature in Google Chrome and more.
title: Google I/O 2017: Android Go launched for countries with low data connectivity | Gadgets Now

author: Jane Lavender
description: Joshua Males has set up his own website – with help from his IT expert dad Steve – and has even produced promotional videos for Facebook and YouTube
title: Boy turns his love of Fidget Spinners into a money-spinning business aged eight
